docs.snippet: A SURPRISE stamp from Honduras is a 1-centavo brown bearing the date "15 Sept. 1942" under a portrait of A. Francisco Morazan, and an inscription "La Patria" (the Fatherland). Sept. 15, 1842, is the date when Morazan, one of Central America's Liberal...
docs.lead_paragraph: A SURPRISE stamp from Honduras is a 1-centavo brown bearing the date "15 Sept. 1942" under a portrait of A. Francisco Morazan, and an inscription "La Patria" (the Fatherland). Sept. 15, 1842, is the date when Morazan, one of Central America's Liberal party leaders, was executed by Costa Rican rebels, and thus the stamp commemorating the centenary of his death is released more than a year ahead of time.

headline.main: FOR A HONDURAS PATRIOT; Special Stamp Marks Centenary of the Death of Francisco Morazan in 1842
FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES WEEK ENDED AUG. 16, 1941

docs.snippet: Again taking its cue from the many uncertainties in the international picture and influenced also by the desire of traders to await a fuller pronouncement on the steps agreed upon at the historic Roosevelt-Churchill rendezvous at sea, the stock...
docs.lead_paragraph: Again taking its cue from the many uncertainties in the international picture and influenced also by the desire of traders to await a fuller pronouncement on the steps agreed upon at the historic Roosevelt-Churchill rendezvous at sea, the stock market's pace slowed yesterday to a walk.

headline.main: DULLNESS IN VIEW IN STOCK MARKET; Slow Sessions Without Little Trend Expected to Continue Until After Labor Day TRADING VOLUME DOWN Business in Bonds Increased -- Prices for the Principal Commodities Move Higher

docs.snippet: LONDON, Aug. 22 (Reuter) -- Regulations have been introduced by the Bank of England bringing dealings between Uruguay and other neutral countries financed through London in United States dollars into line with existing comparable arrangements...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 22 (Reuter) -- Regulations have been introduced by the Bank of England bringing dealings between Uruguay and other neutral countries financed through London in United States dollars into line with existing comparable arrangements applying to other Latin-American countries.
docs.abstract: Bank of Eng requires Uruguayan and Argentine central banks to guarantee trade payments clearing through London in U S dollars

docs.snippet: LARAMIE, Wyo., Aug. 23 -- Sixty men and women with professional interests in inter-American relations and affairs have just completed a nine-weeks Summer institute for Intensive training in Portuguese and Spanish at the University of Wyoming.
docs.lead_paragraph: LARAMIE, Wyo., Aug. 23 -- Sixty men and women with professional interests in inter-American relations and affairs have just completed a nine-weeks Summer institute for Intensive training in Portuguese and Spanish at the University of Wyoming.

docs.snippet: A seasonal hardening in the Canadian dollar, attributed to buying for tourist account, and a sharp decline in the Shanghai yuan an aftermath of nervousness over the situation in the East, were the only changes of importance to develop in the trading...
docs.lead_paragraph: A seasonal hardening in the Canadian dollar, attributed to buying for tourist account, and a sharp decline in the Shanghai yuan an aftermath of nervousness over the situation in the East, were the only changes of importance to develop in the trading in foreign currencies last week. Elsewhere price changes were nominal in the few, free currencies still traded. Business was in small volume.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES WEEK ENDED AUG. 23, 1941
